Html:
hello radioman can you help me? :)

 i have a project and i want to add together with gmaps, but i want to catch only one tile, than draw this tile.

i need an extern function for nWidth and nHeight (Specifies the width/Height (in pixels) of the bitmap.)

I think i need only one tile from Core.tileRectBearing.Width and Core.tileRectBearing.Heigt??
